~
3000$MOVSX64rr32|2512:51,26 MOV32rm|2369:22,51 RET|3459:22 
&
3000$MOV32rm|2369:1000,58 ADD32rm|554:1001,1000,58,28 COPY|19:22,1001 RET|3459:22 
~
3000$MOV32rm|2369:22,58 ADD32rm|554:22,22,58,28 RET|3459:22 
&
